title.value: Validates that the same user cannot be a performer of both tasks in the SharePoint 2-step collaboration workflow

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing
The same user cannot be entered as a Collaborator and Consolidator.

dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where exists (select wf_reviewers from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id = '$value(r_object_id)' and any wf_reviewers is not nullstring and any wf_reviewers in (select wf_doc_coordinators from cd_controlled_doc where r_object_id='$value(r_object_id)' and any wf_doc_coordinators is not nullstring enable(ROW_BASED)) enable(ROW_BASED))
